title: How to Make Kabocha and Baby Spinach Fried Rice

steps.headline: Heat the oil in a wok and add the garlic.
steps.description: Stir fry the garlic until it has flavored the oil.

steps.headline: Add the kabocha.
steps.description: Continue to cook until almost cooked through.

steps.headline: Add the rice and stir-fry ingredients to separate the rice grains.
Flavor and season with soy sauce and pepper.
Add the spinach leaves and pine nuts and mix well.
steps.description: The leaves wilt very quickly, so remove from heat promptly.

text: Heat the oil in a wok and add the garlic. Stir fry the garlic until it has flavored the oil. Add the kabocha. Continue to cook until almost cooked through. Add the rice and stir-fry ingredients to separate the rice grains.  Flavor and season with soy sauce and pepper.  Add the spinach leaves and pine nuts and mix well. The leaves wilt very quickly, so remove from heat promptly. Finished.
